text: "Hey, My Love" is a song by Australian singer songwriter Mark Holden. It was released in February 1977 and peaked at number 32 on the Kent Music Report. Holden performed the song live on Countdown on the 100th episode on 3 April 1977. ==Track listing== ;7"/ Cassette (EMI 11367) Side A # "Hey, My Love" - 3:04 Side B # "We Have Love" - 3:47 ==Charts== {| class="wikitable" |- !align="left"|Chart (1977) !align="left"|Peak position |- |align="left"|Australia KMR | style="text-align:center;"|32 |} ==References== ==External links== * "Hey, My Love" by Mark Holden Category:1977 songs Category:Mark Holden songs Category:1977 singles Category:Pop ballads Category:Songs written by Mark Radice
title: Hey, My Love
